items.title: 一 (yī)
items.content:
Meaning: one, single

Pinyin: yī

Stroke count: 1

This is the simplest Chinese character, representing the number one. It is a single horizontal stroke.

items.title: 人 (rén)
items.content:
Meaning: person, human

Pinyin: rén

Stroke count: 2

This character represents a person. The two strokes suggest a standing human figure.

items.title: 大 (dà)
items.content:
Meaning: big, large, great

Pinyin: dà

Stroke count: 3

This character means big or large. It resembles a person with outstretched arms and legs.
